item.title: Why Write
item.description: Why create a blog at all and why write about random things? Things people may not care about or find ‘useful’. George Orwell said that there are 4 reasons to write: Sheer egoism- The desire to seem clever, to be talked about, to be remembered after death, to get your own back on grown-ups who snubbed you in childhood, etc. Aesthetic enthusiasm- The desire to create something beautiful. Having “pleasure in the impact of one sound on another, in the firmness of good prose or the rhythm of a good story.
